body:
Hello @tomspur! Thanks for updating the PR.



 - In the file [`pandas/tests/test_algos.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/355f872b29fc7eba57379a213562b8e5e5e995bb/pandas/tests/test_algos.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 966:80](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/355f872b29fc7eba57379a213562b8e5e5e995bb/pandas/tests/test_algos.py#L966): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (82 > 79 characters)



##### Comment last updated on December 23, 2018 at 20:34 Hours UTC
